GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a needs FLAG_SEND_ZLP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.254 by commit c46cc6297180a889449ebf1724ff2fa231532b89. For more details please see the references link.
